DOC.brief_summary: To determine overall response rate liposomal 9-Nitro-20 ( S ) -Camptothecin ( L9NC ) administer aerosolization patient non-small-cell lung cancer ( stage ) . To determine toxicity profile L9NC administer aerosolization 5 consecutive day per week X 8 week , every 10 week . To perform pharmacology study L9NC plasma , lung aerosolization . A specific protocol write part .
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , non-randomized Phase II trial DLPC-9NC administer aerosol 5 consecutive day per week 8 week every 10 week . Dose : 0.4 mg/ml 9-NC aerosol reservoir 60 minute ( = daily dose 0.52 mg/m2/day ) per day X5 every week , X8 week , observe 2 week . One course = 10 week . Patients resectable lung cancer receive one course treatment operate two week complete 8-week course .
DOC.criteria: Patients participate INST 1402C protocol Phase II Study Aerosolized LiposomalNitro20 ( S ) Camptothecin ( L9NC ) Patients Advanced ( NSCLC ) Lung Cancer eligible tumor resectable curative intent determine Dr. Reza Mehran .
